name: 15 Minutes (TingleChowder)
description:
A demo for a platformer I worked on over a summer. Just one short level. I was just experimenting and messing with Unity for the first time! The title and idea came from the song also called "Fifteen Minutes" by Mike Krol.

Controls:

(W) - talk

(A) - left

(S) - crouch

(Space) - jump

(S + J) - slide in direction facing

(Esc) - open pause menu in game
